law.catch_line: This section may not be construed to create a private cause of action for any person or local govern...

text.section: This section may not be construed to create a private cause of action for any person or local government.

A decision to fund a project or not to fund a project as required under this subtitle shall not be subject to Title 10, Subtitle 2 (Administrative Procedure Act - Contested Cases) of the State Government Article.
This subtitle may not be construed to prevent an agency from providing technical assistance in an area that is not a priority funding area.
